title: Hextech Chests not being distributed
body: I have gotten many S' and so have my friends while I'm in games with them and we all are not being able to be rewarded the chests, I have 4 chests available to earn and it says you get them by getting high grades.

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, you may be playing on champs you've already earned a chest on. If you tend to play a small pool of champs, you may want to widen your pool in order to earn more chests. 

For complete details, check out our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide). Let me know if you have any questions.

You can only earn one [chest ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)per champion each season.  If you view your Champions page you can see which ones you have already earned a chest on by the gold border around them.
